summary:
This adds a ring that lets you walk during the day as a vampire without weakness to sunlight.

Requires DawnGuard
descriptionHtml:
Requires: DawnGuard, uses some items added by DawnGuard.

Watch the video (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tVrbUlIikdI) for the location and find the player marker. Go to Darklight Tower go up threw it then in the courtyard up the top of Tower go threw the gate and just go forward then you will see some stairs of a Nord ruins go up them.

You can use the enchantment on other items as well by disenchanting the ring and enchanting another item with the enchantment.

This adds a ring that lets you walk during the day as a vampire without weakness to sunlight.

I know there is allready other mods that do this.

Link to video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tVrbUlIikdI

You may want to put it up to 480p sorry for the poor quality it's just so people can find it.
author: Sufeewi
